result.markdown: --- title: 'Lab-2: Down the R-abbit Hole...' subtitle: 'Welcome ! Introduce Yourself to R, RStudio, and to all of Us!' summary: Welcome ! Introduce Yourself to R, RStudio! date: 09/July/2021 date-modified: "2023-05-16" image: featured.jpg order: 20 --- ## {{< fa folder-open >}} Slides and Tutorials | | | |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ## Introduction Welcome! Let's start our journey to the Garden of Data Visualization, with this terrific presentation by the great ( and sadly late..) **Hans Rosling**. The best stats you've ever seen by Hans Rosling: {{< video https://youtu.be/hVimVzgtD6w >}} We will run some boiler-plate R code today! Nothing ( almost! ) to code! We will get used to the tools and words of the trade: R, RStudio, installation, packages, libraries....
